name: Termina (StasLyakhotskyy)
description:
IMPORTANT: To avoid glitches use full screen mode while playing...

A short retro game about life death and finishing your projects

Features:

  • Made by one developer
  • Has only 3 sprites
  • Made in 20 days on Github GameOff
  • Possible full version?
  • Has more bugs than gameplay... :(
  • Opensource(here is the link to GitHub)

UPDATE(things fixed):

  • Blocks gravity
  • Level system
  • Value block
  • Added Windows version!
